title: Fix publish domain slug to allow deployment

requirements.text: Update the app’s publish/deployment domain (slug) to a valid value derived from the requested name “ip look up” that satisfies the platform rules (5–50 characters; letters, numbers, and hyphens only). Use: "ip-look-up".

quotes: Domain ip-lookup-website-(visitor-ip-+-domain/ip-lookup-w must be between 5 and 50 characters and contain only letters, numbers, and hyphens. i can not because of this so fix it

acceptanceCriteria: The configured publish/deployment domain is exactly "ip-look-up".
A publish/deploy attempt no longer fails with the domain validation error about invalid characters/length.
No user-facing UI text is changed as part of this fix.

constraints: Use English for any user-facing text.
Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui or other frontend.immutablePaths.
nonGoals: Adding new IP lookup features or changing lookup behavior.
Changing styling, layout, or copy on the IP lookup page.
